korean: 오늘 하루 종일 치킨 생각만 했어, 진짜 미치는 줄 알았어.
점심 먹으면서도 치킨 생각, 일하면서도 치킨 생각.
퇴근하자마자 치킨집 앱 켰는데, 메뉴 고르는 게 제일 행복해.
후라이드냐 양념이냐, 이건 정말 영원한 고민이야.
반반 시킬까 했는데, 혼자 먹기엔 너무 많은 것 같아서.
결국 양념치킨으로 결정했어, 오늘 기분엔 달달한 게 땡겨서.
순살로 할까 뼈 있는 걸로 할까도 고민됐는데, 뼈 있는 게 맛있잖아.
사이드로 치즈볼도 추가했어, 치즈 당기는 날이거든.
배달비 아깝긴 한데, 치킨 먹고 싶은 마음엔 장사 없어.
30분 기다리는 게 진짜 길게 느껴져, 배고파서.
초인종 울리고 문 열자마자 치킨 냄새가 확 풍겨.
박스 열 때 그 두근거림 진짜 좋아, 매번 느끼지만.
첫 입 먹을 때가 제일 맛있는데, 그 다음부터는 배부르기 시작해.
다 먹고 나니 배불러서 움직이기 싫은데, 행복해.
english: I thought about fried chicken all day today, I was literally going crazy.
Thinking about chicken while eating lunch, thinking about chicken while working.
As soon as I got off work I opened the chicken place app, and choosing the menu is the happiest part.
Fried or seasoned, this is really an eternal dilemma.
I thought about getting half and half, but it seemed like too much for one person.
I ended up deciding on seasoned chicken because I was craving something sweet today.
I also wondered whether to get boneless or with bones, but the ones with bones taste better.
I added cheese balls as a side, it's one of those cheese craving days.
The delivery fee is a waste, but when you want chicken, there's no reasoning with that.
Waiting 30 minutes feels really long because I'm hungry.
When the doorbell rings and I open the door, the chicken smell hits me right away.
That excitement when opening the box is so good, I feel it every time.
The first bite is the most delicious, but after that I start getting full.
Having it with Coke is like the perfect combo.
After finishing I'm so full I don't want to move, but I'm happy.
